explains: adj. 偏狭的；小都市的；土里土气的

sentences.en: They wanted the store to have a folksy small-town image.
sentences.cn: 他们希望这家商店具有小城镇那种朴实热情的形象。

sentences.en: Life in a small town could be deadly dull.
sentences.cn: 小城镇的生活可能会非常没意思。

sentences.en: Two miles further on we came to a small town.
sentences.cn: 我们又走了两英里，来到了一座小镇。
